list.title: module:daySchedule~createTodoItem
list.description:
Create or update a todo item
Handles the creation of a new todo item or updating an existing item.

list.title: module:daySchedule~editTodoItem
list.description:
Edit a todo item
Populates the modal with the current values of the selected todo item for editing.

list.title: module:daySchedule~formatDateTimeForDisplay
list.description:
Format the date and time for display
Converts the date and time string to a more readable format.

list.title: module:daySchedule~formatDateTimeForInput
list.description:
Format the date and time for input
Converts the date and time string to a format suitable for input fields.

list.title: module:daySchedule~loadTasks
list.description:
Load tasks from local storage
Retrieves the list of tasks from local storage and populates the todo list.

list.title: module:daySchedule~rgbToHex
list.description:
Helper function to convert rgb color to hex
Converts an RGB color value to a hex color string.

list.title: module:daySchedule~saveTasks
list.description:
Save tasks to local storage
Stores the current list of tasks in local storage.

list.title: module:daySchedule~sortTasks
list.description:
Sort tasks by date and time
Sorts the tasks in the todo list by their date and time in ascending order.

list.description: initial the Calendar with the current date

list.description: Initial the data, calendar and eventList when the web load.
